thread.title: What it was really like to work for Steve Jobs
thread.title_full: What it was really like to work for Steve Jobs - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Andy Cunningham
title: What it was really like to work for Steve Jobs
text:
Above: Andy Cunningham (right) with actress Sarah Snook, who plays the role of Cunningham in the movie “Steve Jobs.” Top: Steve Jobs in 1985. Above: Andy Cunningham (right) with actress Sarah Snook, who plays...
All the buzz about the new Steve Jobs movie, and my small role in it as his publicist, played by Sarah Snook, has sparked a lot of discussion in my network about Steve Jobs as a leader. Above: Andy Cunningham (right) with actress Sarah Snook, who plays the role of Cunningham in the movie “Steve Jobs.” Top: Steve Jobs in 1985. Above: Andy Cunningham (right) with actress Sarah Snook, who plays...
All the buzz about the new Steve Jobs movie, and my small role in it as his publicist, played by Sarah Snook, has sparked a lot of discussion in my network about Steve Jobs as a leader.
